A

AsyncHandler - Class in org.kite.async
A proxy class for invoking async methods.
AsyncMethod - Annotation Type in org.kite.annotations
Methods marked with this annotation, will be called asynchronously, if Provided.async() instance has AsyncType.METHODS or AsyncType.ALL type.
AsyncResult - Annotation Type in org.kite.annotations
Callbacks to AsyncMethod that will be called by given AsyncMethod.value() code.
AsyncType - Enum in org.kite.async
Type of asynchronous invocation of interfaces, marked with Provided annotation.

CommandService - Class in org.kite.services
A helpful android.app.Service extension, that can execute commands in separate Executor.

Constructs new CommandService with given workExecutor where all invokes of CommandService.execute(Runnable) will be redelivered to.
CommandService() - Constructor for class org.kite.services.CommandService
Shortcat for CommandService.CommandService(java.util.concurrent.Executor) and MainThreadExecutor as a parameter.
connect() - Method in class org.kite.wire.Wire
Connects to a service.

W

Wire - Class in org.kite.wire
Main class for providing connection to local services.

Key object to identify connections with service and target.

Binder implementation that holds reference to enclosing WiredService.

Creates new WireBinder upon given WiredService instance.
WireCallback - Interface in org.kite.wire
This callback interface is to use with Wire.
Wired - Annotation Type in org.kite.annotations
Fields with this annotation will be filled whet service is connected.
WiredService - Class in org.kite.wire
WiredService is a provider of dependencies via Provided annotated methods and fields.

with(Context) - Static method in class org.kite.wire.Wire
Constructs a new Wire instance upon given android.content.Context.
wrapAll(Object, Class<?>, Executor) - Static method in class org.kite.async.AsyncHandler
Creates new AsyncHandler that will invoke all methods of given type interface of origin object on given executor.
wrapMethods(Object, Class<?>, Executor) - Static method in class org.kite.async.AsyncHandler
Creates new AsyncHandler that will invoke only methods marked with AsyncMethod annotation of given type interface of origin object on given executor.
